mods.abstract: The California Magazine of Western Square and Round Dancing by the Square Dancers of Southern California. This edition includes a table of contents which lists the following: SQUARE DANCES "Arizona Double Star", "Don't Call Me Sweetie Anymore", and "Whatchamacalit". ROUND DANCES "Three O'Clock Waltz", and "Shoe Skidoo (R/M)". SPECIAL FEATURES "Square Dancing is BIG", "Meet Me in St. Louis", "What Lies Ahead", "These are the Gates of Asilomar", and "The Basic Round Dance Positions". This edition also includes the the regular features entitled "From the Floor", "As I See It", "Style Series: The Language of Sqaure Dancing", "The Hot Potato", "Square of the Month (Harley Smith)", "Chuck Jones Notebook", "Help for Your Square Dance Club", "Paging the Roundancers (Manning Smiths)", "Calendar of Square Dancing Events", and "Round the Outside Ring".
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
